Package amuse.nodes.validator.interfaces

Interface Summary
ClassificationQualityMetricCalculatorInterface Methods which calculate metrics based on classification results and ground truth information should implement this interface.
DataReductionMetricCalculatorInterface Methods which calculate data reduction metrics implement this interface.
MetricCalculatorInterface All metric calculators should implement this interface
ValidatorInterface Validation methods should implement this interface.
 

Class Summary
ClassificationQualityMetricCalculator Methods which calculate metrics based on classification results and ground truth information should extend this class.
DataReductionMetricCalculator Methods which calculate data reduction metrics should extend this class.
ValidationMetric For all validation metrics.
ValidationMetricDouble For validation metrics which consist of one double value.
ValidationMetricString For validation metrics which consist of a string (e.g. the list of correctly predicted songs).
